review:
I visited Dr.swetal for my joint pain and rash on face which was diagnosed as LUPUS.
I have visited many doctors before but they usually don't given enough time but Dr.swetal listened to all my concerns and explained me about the disease .
It's been 2 weeks now and am seeing lot of improvement. 

Also the clinic ambience at DERMACLINIX and staff was very polite and helpful
Doctor is friendly and it's too early to say anything.  Consultation fee is reasonable and they don't charge me for second visit which was within 7 days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review:
Dr. Swetal is very friendly and kind.  She readily explains to patients everything they want to know about their illness, the laboratory tests and the treatment options.
She is very patient and is not in a hurry.
Thumbs up for Dr. Swetal.

review: Very well-known treatment  and procedures regarding wellness and speedy recovery. Doctor very friendly approach with patients explain all medicines use and duration of intake.Also respect of time no waiting.
